meanings.definition: The state or quality of being cheerful and lighthearted.
meanings.sent1: Her face lit up with merriness when she saw her friends.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with merriness during the holiday party.
meanings.sent3: The merriness in the air was contagious, spreading smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: His jokes added a touch of merriness to the otherwise dull meeting.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter echoed with merriness through the playground.

meanings.definition: A feeling of joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: The merriness in her heart was evident in her glowing smile.
meanings.sent2: The holiday season always brings a sense of merriness to the town.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected gift filled him with a wave of merriness.
meanings.sent4: The merriness of winning the game was unmatched by anything else.
meanings.sent5: The merriness of the celebration lingered long after the party ended.
